name: @teamturing/icons
description: Icon components for React based project
author: Sungchang Park <psch300@gmail.com> (https://github.com/psch300)

scripts.svgr: svgr --index-template ./template/index-template.js --icon --typescript --replace-attr-values '#8D94A0=currentColor' -d src svg && lerna run gen:icon
scripts.build: rm -rf dist esm && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --declarationDir dist --jsx react-jsx && rollup --config rollup.config.js
